LocaleResource.Value: Pager Panel Integration Selector

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.PagerPanelIntegrationSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Html selector for the element after which the panel that contains the paging will be shown. This setting is applied only in the cases when initially there is no pager and afterwards it is necessary to be added.

LocaleResource.Value: Product Page Size Dropdown Selector

LocaleResource.Value: Enable Infinite Scrolling

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ScrollToElementOnThePageAfterFiltration
LocaleResource.Value: Scroll To Element On The Page After Filtration (Desktop)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ScrollToElementOnThePageAfterFiltration.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you enable this setting, after each filtration the page will be scrolled to the element specified below only on dektop devices.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ScrollToElementOnThePageAfterFiltrationMobile
LocaleResource.Value: Scroll To Element On The Page After Filtration (Mobile)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ScrollToElementOnThePageAfterFiltrationMobile.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you enable this setting, after each filtration the page will be scrolled to the element specified below only on mobile devices.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseFiltersPanelAfterFiltrationInMobile
LocaleResource.Value: Close Filters Panel After Filtration (Mobile)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.CloseFiltersPanelAfterFiltrationInMobile.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you enable this setting, after each filtration the filters panel will be closed on mobile devices.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowNumberOfReturnedProducts
LocaleResource.Value: Show Number Of Returned Products

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowNumberOfReturnedProducts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This setting enables showing information for the products that are visible out of all available, matching the filter criteria in format e.g. "5 showing from 20".

LocaleResource.Value: Number Of Returned Products Selector

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.ShowNumberOfReturnedProductsSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Html selector for the element after which the panel with number of returned products will be shown. If the element is not present the panel will be shown inside .product-selectors element.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Client.PriceRangeFilter.Title

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.TrailingZeroesSeparator
LocaleResource.Value: Trailing Zeroes Separator

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopAjaxFilters.Admin.TrailingZeroesSeparator.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This setting is used to remove trailing zeroes from min/max price in price range filter. For example if you have min or max price like 12.350,00 and you like to get rid of the last two zeroes you can specify ',' as value of the setting. If you want to specify several separators keep in mind that you need to list them without separating them - for example if you need dot and a comma as your separators write them like this '.,'.
